phrases: This is Morioh City Radio, and our next segment is
Our first letter is from Forever 21, Pretty Baby.
I was late meeting someone because of that thing again.
Yeah, the one by the station!
The railroad crossing that never let us you through.
Ugh, it just goes ding, ding, ding, ding, ding, ding...
It just needs to shut up!
There are Stand users besides us at this school?
He is Toshikazu Hazamada, a student in class 3-C.
This Hazamada guy apparently got into
an argument over something silly with a friend right around the start of spring.
One of them had insulted the other's favorite idol or anime or something.
That night, surprisingly, the friend he got into the argument with
gouged out his own left eye with a mechanical pencil.
Next thing I knew, I was staring at my left eye, which I would gouged out, with my right eye.
So you are saying that this guy gouged out
his left eye using some kind of a Stand?
Something about this is really fishy.
Josuke, you have got no right to criticize me.
I have got a real job now, y'know!
I found myself a little job that involves financing.
You do not mean you became a loan shark, do you?
It is a very reputable establishment, though!
Still, though, we cannot just ignore this.
Just leave it to that idiot Josuke.
There is something scary going on in my town.
If Morioh City is in danger, that means my parents, my sister,
and everyone else important to me will have to face that danger.
So even if it is scary, I got to do something!
What a tough thing to say.
Nothing less from the man I have chosen to admire!
I will be heading home now!
Looks like he is not in the classroom.
But if that Hazamada guy really did gouge out his friend's eye
and can still blend into normal school life...
He must be one creepy guy.
I am going to check out his locker.
Tell me first before you break it!
So he is still at school.
So he is in the tennis club and likes manga.
Still, this guy's got way too much stuff.
I do not think the bow and arrow would be in here, but...
Is this one of those dolls they sell at art stores for sketching?
It turned into me when I touched it.
But now we know for sure...
You have got some nerve, turning into me!
You have heard of Perman, right?
It sounds and talks just like him!
You know the copy robot from Perman?
Do not you think it would be great to have one around?
You have not heard of Perman?!
I am the one asking the questions here!
But mine is a copy doll that replicates people I do not want around.
Once it copies you, you will mimic all of its movements.
Which means it is not a puppet,
And one rag's been hung out to dry.
Oh, but I am not the one who did it.
The one who did it was you, his friend.
pisses me off more than anything.
When you do not do anything yourself,
but use others to do things for you.
That makes me want to kick your ass like nothing else!
Looks like you are out of range.
If you cannot move from that spot, your Stand cannot get any closer, either.
Which means if I maintain this distance,
Josuke, you stand no chance against me!
This Stand's name is Show Off.
By possessing a doll, it has gained a physical form...
Which means even normal people can see it.
My goal is to beat the shit out of Jotaro Kujo
and run him out of this city.
An outsider, coming here and trying to dig up dirt on us...
But I heard that his Star Platinum can stop time for a second or two.
There is no one in our group that stands a chance against him.
That is, no one besides my Show Off, now that it is copied you, Josuke!
I will have to knock you out now.
The genuine article would just be in the way.
As long as you did not cut the nerve, you will be able to see again...
Looks like he is going to be out for a while.
We are going to go straight after Jotaro.
I am pretty sure the hotel that Jotaro's staying at is...
But man, you have really got some guts.
Even though you are hurt, you managed to use your Stand to trick him.
as soon as I got hit, you fixed my broken bones with Shining Diamond.
I would appreciate it if you could fix the injuries I got from breaking down
the door and window right after that, too.
Hello, this is the Morioh Grand Hotel.
Oh, uh, could you put me through to Jotaro Kujo in Room 324?
We have to hurry up and tell Jotaro about that Stand!
The line for Room 324 is currently in use.
Please wait until the current call is completed.
It must have been the copy!
It called him before I did!
There is another Stand user at your school?
I will tell you the details at Morioh Station.
Please come to the station plaza.
You should be able to get there in fifteen minutes.
In front of the station in fifteen minutes.
He must have left the room.
They must have lured him out to meet them somewhere!
We are just going to have to go after the copy!
I really could not tell the difference between you and the copy.
was not when I saw its face.
You see your fingers more often every day than your face, right?
I could tell that it had copied me right down to my fingerprints.
You do not know why we are together?
We have got to hurry and catch up with Hazamada,
or Jotaro's going to be in trouble!
There will be trouble if Jotaro meets the copy!
I do not know what we should do, but we need to catch up!
Why the hell are you the only one they say goodbye to?
I have never had anyone say that to me.
All the girls in this school are ugly, anyhow.
Why the hell did you accept that?
What the hell is the difference between you and me?
You do not have any time to waste, do you?
Who the hell do you think you are talking to?!
I am made of wood, remember?
Damn it, I am getting pissed off.
It is my own Stand, but this happens every time.
The other day, I had it copy my crush, Junko,
but I got pissed off because it kept doing things to piss me off,
so I never even got anywhere.
Does not anyone in this world have a decent personality?
I will hurry up and take care of Jotaro first,
then I will crush him to bits!
Hey, it is not like he meant it.
That is exactly why I said it.
Man, he looks like a dying cricket.
It was a good description, huh?
I will carve him up myself.
You do not have to worry about that.
I am just going to make sure
that you will never be able to open your mouth again.
We finally caught up with you, asshole!
When you come face to face with Show Off, you become a puppet, Josuke!
Do not be so sure about that.
I did not throw that shard to hit you.
I threw it so I could put it back in its original form!
Just pretend you have your hand in your pocket!
that Jotaro should arrive at the station soon!
I am shocked that Josuke was safe,
but let us give up on beating him right now!
So they are meeting him in front of the station.
J-Josuke, we have no time to waste!
The way they went is the fastest way to get to the station!
And that is why I have got you, Koichi.
Looks like Josuke's not here yet.
If I see any sign of him, I will just take control of him.
The railroad crossing that never let us you through!
We will have to wait a minute or two...
We will go through the station building.
Even if he catches up with us, the train will stall Josuke!
I will head over to the meeting spot first!
Wh-What the hell is that Stand?!
That is why I said I have got you.
We got Hazamada good, did not we, Josuke?
A Stand that copied you down to your fingerprints?
There would have been trouble if he would gotten here before me.
That copy bastard is missing his right hand, so it will be easy.
I blew off his right hand.
Use that to tell us apart.
They should get here at any moment.
Why do I have this thing?
Why did I get a pen out of Jotaro's pocket?
My arm just stopped moving on its own.
O-On the other side of the glass...
You are going to stab Jotaro in the head with that pen and kill him instantly.
After all, if his death is not instant, your Shining Diamond will just fix him.
This is your fault for getting outta line!
I was just going to halfway kill Jotaro to chase him out of town.
But now you are the one who will kill Jotaro!
It will be all your fault!
Let him have it, Show Off!
Looks like those guys finally found Hazamada.
You were just across the pedestrian bridge at the station, just like that Josuke said.
He treated our wounds, and I am not even sure how, but they are all better!
I will make sure I pay you back in full for earlier.
Let us take a little trip behind the restroom.
That Stand is pretty terrifying if it catches you.
Well, I guess I will break this doll now.
It will make me feel better.
Tamami was admitted to the hospital.
Episode 8 Yukako Yamagishi Falls In Love, Part 1
Episode 8 Yu ka ko Yamagishi Falls In Love, Part 1
